# Doll List
```{r, message=F, echo=F}
condformat(df.dolllist.pretty) %>%
    rule_fill_discrete(type) %>%
    rule_fill_discrete(name, expression = df.dolllist$rarity,
                       colours = c("5" = "#FFB600", "4" = "#D6E35A", "3" = "#6BDFCE", "1" = "#DEB6FF")) %>%
    rule_fill_discrete(Ringed, expression = Ringed == "Yes", colours = c("TRUE" = "#F7AEA5")) %>%
    #rule_fill_gradient(slv) %>%
    theme_htmlTable(rnames = FALSE, n.cgroup = rbind(c(1,2,NA),
                           c(2,2,2)),
                           cspan.rgroup = 2,
                           col.columns = c(rep("none", 2),
                                           rep("#F5FBFF", 5)
                                          ),
                           #css.cgroup =c(rep("padding: 0px 20px 0px;", 2),
                           #              rep("padding: 0px 60px 0px;", 5)),
                           css.cell = "padding: 0px 40px 0px;")
```
